page.title: 06Halesworth Law and Order
page.content: In Halesworth Middle Section there is only 1 police station.It is the main Headquarters of North East Suffolk apart from Lowestoft.It has a lost property department,a crime prevention unit,traffic control section,security unit and an accident prevention department.The facilities the station has are 5 cells,3 interview rooms and about 20 vehicles which work from Halesworth station.The station has a pocket radio transmitter,rifle range, teleprinter, and a classroom.They hold court functions and have a coroners room.72 people work at the station they are :2 W.P.C's,36 P.C's,9 SERGEANTS,2 INSPECTORS,1 CHIEF INSPECTOR,1 SUPT., 4 DETECTIVES AND 17 CIVILIAN EMPLOYEES.The most common crimes in the area are;Petty theft, Burglary and Criminal Damage.
